title: Question about account transfers
body:
Support didn't answer so i'm trying my luck here.
I have 2 main accounts, one on EUW and one on EUNE. i want to move my EUNE account to EUW but they both share the same username (when i log in). my question is what will happen happen, will it not let my change regions? will it ask me to switch my username? any advice is appreciated.

bonus question - can i get my EUNE account to take the summoner name of my EUW or do i need to buy a summoner name change on the EUW account?

replies.body:
When you move an account with an identical username to another region you already have the username on, you'll be prompted to select a new username during the transfer process. If you want to swap summoner names between your accounts or simply move one over, you'll have to pay for a summoner name change. You can reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you need help with this.

If you have any questions, let me know.
